# Corex UI LLMs (Machine-Optimized Reference)

> Single-source, machine-readable summary to ground coding assistants in Corex UI.

- Canonical URL: https://corex-ui.com/llms.txt
- Human docs: https://corex-ui.com
- Scope: Installation, guides, conventions, component index
- Goal: Improve suggestion accuracy, enforce accessibility and design-token usage, reduce hallucinations

---

## Installation

- [Introduction](https://corex-ui.com/installation/introduction.md)
- [Vite](https://corex-ui.com/installation/vite.md)
- [Astro](https://corex-ui.com/installation/astro.md)
- [Eleventy](https://corex-ui.com/installation/eleventy.md)
- [Serve](https://corex-ui.com/installation/serve.md)
## Guides

- [Tailwind](https://corex-ui.com/guides/tailwind.md)
- [Theming](https://corex-ui.com/guides/theming.md)

## Sync & Versioning

- This file is updated alongside Corex UI releases
- Tools may cache content; refresh or re-add the URL after upgrades
- If the URL is temporarily unavailable, copy its contents into the toolâ€™s project knowledge
